text:
Kinoko opens his jade urn which begins to shake in his hands.                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
Light and smoke emanate from the jade urn.  Before your eyes, the smoke coalesces into a snaer hafwa!                                                                                                                                                                                  |
"Stop right there!"  The shout reverberates through the area as the guard charges towards Kinoko.  "You're under arrest!"                                                                                                                                                              |
Kinoko seems to be in shock as the guard binds his hands and he is led off.
